incident_text: Multiple users reporting they cannot access the CRM system. Error message shows 'Authentication failed - LDAP server unreachable'. Started approximately 30 minutes ago. Affecting the entire sales team (~50 users). No changes were deployed recently.

Customer data export job failed overnight. The nightly batch process that generates compliance reports for regulators did not complete. Error logs show disk space exhaustion on the reporting server. Reports are due to SEC by end of business today.
User John Smith in accounting cannot print to the 3rd floor printer. Other users on the same floor are not affected. John's computer was reimaged last week.

Website response times have increased from 200ms to 3 seconds over the past hour. No deployment in the last 24 hours. Database CPU is at 95%. Affecting all public-facing pages. Customer complaints starting to come in via social media.

Security team detected unusual login patterns - 500 failed attempts against the admin portal from various IP addresses in Eastern Europe over the past 15 minutes. No successful breaches detected yet. WAF is blocking most attempts but some are getting through.

The inventory reconciliation report shows a discrepancy of $2.3M between the warehouse management system and the ERP. Finance discovered this during month-end close. Unclear if this is a data sync issue or actual inventory loss.

Automated trading system executed 3 duplicate orders worth $150K total before the error was caught. Orders have been reversed but customers received duplicate confirmation emails. Compliance team needs to file an incident report.
New developer accidentally committed AWS credentials to public GitHub repository. Credentials have been rotated but the commit is still in git history. Security scan flagged this 10 minutes ago.

Email attachment scanning is causing 15-minute delays on all incoming emails with attachments larger than 5MB. Users complaining they can't receive important contracts on time. Issue started after yesterday's security patch.
Quarterly board presentation file is corrupted and won't open. Board meeting is tomorrow at 9 AM. File was last saved on the shared drive 3 days ago. IT needs to recover from backup.

Production database backup failed for the 3rd consecutive night. Storage array is showing warnings about degraded RAID. No data loss yet but risk is increasing. 2TB of customer transaction data at risk.
GDPR data subject access request received - customer wants all their data exported within the 30-day deadline. Current manual process takes 2 weeks. Customer is threatening legal action.
